popt4jlib
Interface SubjectIntf

All Known Implementing Classes:
GLockingObservableObserverBase
public interface SubjectIntf

The SubjectIntf implements the Subject Object's methods in the well-known Observer Design Pattern. Also known as the Observable part of the pattern. See the comments in the ObserverIntf class.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou
